edu.ttu.cs.se.entity

Class ItemEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ttu.cs.se.entity.ItemEntity

  • public class ItemEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity storing the information of an item in inventory.

      static java.lang.String COL_SEP
      String variable to separate info columns.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemEntity

        public ItemEntity(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.Double price,
                  java.lang.Boolean alcohol,
                  java.lang.String desc,
                  java.lang.Double discount)
        The ItemEntity's parameterized constructor using the required info.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item.
        price - the price of the item.
        alcohol - whether the item contains alcohol.
        desc - the description of the item.
        discount - the discount to be applied on the item.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.Boolean dispName,
                                  java.lang.Boolean dispDesc,
                                  java.lang.Boolean dispPrice,
                                  java.lang.Boolean dispAlcohol,
                                  java.lang.Boolean dispDiscount)
        A special method to retrieve specific elements from the ItemEntity.
        Parameters:
        dispName - whether to include the name in the output.
        dispDesc - whether to include the description in the output.
        dispPrice - whether to include the price in the output.
        dispAlcohol - whether to include whether the item has alcohol.
        dispDiscount - whether to include the discount in the output.
        Returns:
        the string with the specified information.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides the default toString function by calling the custom getString. It returns a prepared string which includes the name, the description and the price but does not include the alcohol and discount private field.s
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string representation.
